XIII.i.2.A.6.e
.
Preventing Duplicate Payment
The VSC permanently retains the annotated copy(ies) of
VA Form 21-4502
in the  claims folder to prevent duplicate payment in the event a subsequent claim is received
and the criteria for a subsequent (second or additional) automobile allowance provided in
38 U.S.C. 3903(a)
are not met.
Reference
:  For more information on the circumstances in which a subsequent automobile allowance may be warranted, see
M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, 2.A.1.b
.
